thread.section_title: Hotel Le Marcel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Super hotel
thread.title_full: Super hotel - Review of Hotel Le Marcel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 266martines
title: Super hotel
text:
We had an excellent stay at Le Marcel : the room was rather small, but well organized and the bathroom was well equipped (super shower!). We received a warm welcome, everything was very clean, the breakfast was very good quality and the staff was super. Only 10 min walk from Gare du Nord and metro behind the corner, we found also that the location was good.
We will certainly go back there ...
